name: YamlWriter
description: Feed in parameters to write out yaml to new or existing files
author: Jordan Knight
helpMarkDown: Pass through build params and other interesting things by using a comma separated list of name value pairs. Supports deep creation - e.g. something.somethingelse=10,something.somethingelseagain='hi'. New files will be created, and existing files updated.

inputs.name: file
inputs.label: File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Input an existing or new file to write the output

inputs.name: set
inputs.label: Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: The output parameters for the files - separated by commas. E.g. some.value=23,buildName='awesomebuild'

inputs.name: dry
inputs.label: Output Only
inputs.helpMarkDown: Only output the result, do not save the file.
